Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.threading

Class RepeatingKivaKitThread

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.threading.KivaKitThread
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.threading.RepeatingKivaKitThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
Operation, Pausable, Startable, Stoppable, Receiver<Transmittable>, Transmitter<Transmittable>, Named, NamedObject, PackagePathed, Broadcaster, Listener, Repeater, Transceiver, Runnable
public class RepeatingKivaKitThread extends KivaKitThread implements Pausable
A thread that repeatedly executes the KivaKitThread.onRun() method implementation at a given Frequency. The thread can be paused and resumed between executions of the user code.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Method Details

    • run

      public static RepeatingKivaKitThread run​(Listener listener, String name, Frequency every, Runnable code)
      Returns:
      A started thread with the given name that will run the given code at the given frequency. Unlike KivaKitThread.repeat(java.lang.String, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.time.Frequency, java.lang.Runnable), this thread can be paused and resumed.

    • run

      public static RepeatingKivaKitThread run​(Listener listener, String name, Runnable code)
      Returns:
      A started thread with the given name that will run the given code repeatedly. Unlike KivaKitThread.repeat(java.lang.String, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.time.Frequency, java.lang.Runnable), this thread can be paused and resumed.
